overview:
Emanuele Tha is founder and Partner at Moai Capital Group Venture a new european early stage venture capital firm focused on investiments in new media real time company in Europe.

He was previously associate at dpixel fund a leading early stage venture capital in italy where he focused on investments within the consumer Internet, specifically within social media, mobile, e-commerce, advertising and real-time media.

Prior to joining Dpixel, emanuele spent 3 years like a lawyer at Carnelutti international Law Firm, where he focused on M&A, and Venture Capital practice areas and he was also a founder of Myblogjournal.com one of the first news aggregator in Europe in 2006, sold to Caltagirone Group in 2007.

Emanuele graduated with a degree in Corporate and Commercial law from UniversitÃ  Statale di Milano, and got a Master in Strategic Management and Corporate Finance from SDA Bocconi Business School.

degrees.subject: Master in Strategic Management and Corporate Finance
